gptx.name: GPT-X
gptx.shortDescription: Versatile chat assistant for everyday tasks
gptx.longDescription: A general-purpose AI assistant designed to help with a wide variety of everyday tasks. From answering questions to creative writing, GPT-X adapts to your needs with advanced language understanding.

devbuddy.name: DevBuddy
devbuddy.shortDescription: AI-powered code reviews and snippet generation
devbuddy.longDescription: Your AI pair programmer that helps with code reviews, generates snippets, suggests refactoring improvements, and writes documentation. Supports 50+ programming languages.

uxsage.name: UX Sage
uxsage.shortDescription: UX heuristics evaluation and design audits
uxsage.longDescription: Expert UX evaluation assistant that performs heuristic evaluations, accessibility audits, and provides actionable design feedback based on industry best practices.

rescope.name: ReScope
rescope.longDescription: Academic research assistant that helps with literature reviews, manages citations, and creates comprehensive summaries while maintaining scholarly accuracy.

focusfox.name: FocusFox
focusfox.shortDescription: Task management and focus cycle optimization
focusfox.longDescription: Productivity assistant that helps manage tasks, optimizes focus cycles using proven techniques like Pomodoro, and provides insights into your work patterns.

codewhiz.name: CodeWhiz
codewhiz.longDescription: Advanced coding assistant specializing in debugging complex issues, performance optimization, and security vulnerability detection across multiple platforms.

pixelpro.name: PixelPro
pixelpro.shortDescription: Design system creation and component libraries
pixelpro.longDescription: Design system expert that helps create scalable component libraries, manages design tokens, and ensures consistency across digital products.

datadruid.name: DataDruid
datadruid.longDescription: Data science assistant that performs statistical analysis, creates compelling visualizations, builds predictive models, and generates comprehensive reports.
